ratings.comment: The best professor at UW-Madison. She's extremely knowledgeable about the field and is willing to guide students not only through her class, but also grad school applications, interviews, and more. She's also incredibly kind, caring, and accepting. I also took CSD 481 and it was lovely. 100% would take her classes again.

Audra has been one of my favorite professors in the CS&D department! She is extremely knowledgeable and passionate about the material that she's teaching. She is very clear about what she expects you to know for the exam. She always has her student's best interest and is more than willing to help/meet with you to help you succeed!

Popping in here to give a recent review of Audra! She is the BEST and widely respected among her faculty and students for a reason. Super straightforward lectures and exams are exactly what she says it will be. One of the sweetest people and very aware of her subject area. Clever and kind
She is an amazing professor, she works with you, gives no BS work and her tests are super straightforward. TAKE THIS CLASS

Audra is AMAZING! You can tell how passionate she is about her research, and all of the topics she talks about in her classes. She is so personable and you can talk to her about anything. Oh, and this class is easy as pie! Her lectures are really interesting, so even if you hate lectures she's really good at grabbing your attention!
Great professor-know the material in her slides and you'll pass. She's passionate and makes you interested in the material she's teaching.

She is so sweet and loves talking about her research in this class! She is very approachable for all things CSDgrad school. This was a super easy class and I really enjoyed getting to know Audra! Recommend going to class for pop up assignments, but all the info is on the slides.
